scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, surrounded by a group of men, some wearing crowns and others religious habits. The figures are arranged in a semi-circle around Mary and Jesus. In the background, there are stylized architectural elements resembling buildings with towers and arched windows, suggesting an urban or ecclesiastical setting. The overall composition evokes a sense of reverence and communal gathering around the central figures of Mary and the Child.
